projects.name: SureSol Women Safety App
description: Uses speech-to-text and AI object detection to trigger SOS alerts without user interaction by analysing surrounding threats.
Features: User Authentication, OTP verification, Realtime Threat Analysis, WhatsApp and SMS SOS alerts with location Info, Chat Forum, Safety Tips, Danger Heat Map.
Technologies: Python, Flask, Flutter, Firebase, Google MLKit, Google Maps API, Twilio APIs

projects.name: Rating Predictor
description: Predicts the star rating of a given review using advanced neural network-based NLP model.
Techniques Used: Word Lemmatization, Logistic Regression, Vectorization, Embedding.
Technologies: Python, SciPy, TensorFlow, Keras, NLTK.
